[Chritsmas] 

Family member: So Troy I bought a new stock I want to know what you think?

Me: Oh nice, what is it?

FM: Beyond Meat

Me: 

FM: it‚Äôs really gone down recently thought it might be a good value

Me: *in my head* ‚Äúvalue‚Äù 

Me: proceeds to go into 30 min soliloquy

@JesseKellyDC ‚ÄúNutrition research‚Äù is BS pedaled to promote big Agro-Corp at the expense of the health of the citizenry examples: food pyramid pushes way too many grains; ‚ÄúBeyond Meat‚Äù is more poison than food, but allows Agro-Corp large profit margins on cheap inputs

In efforts to do better, starting is the key!!!

Plant-Based...not plant only, we're working on it!
